Sample Argo File (Delayed Core Data)

Source: R/extdata.R
D4900785_048.nc.Rd

This is NetCDF file for delayed-mode data for cycle 48 of Argo float 4900785, downloaded from https://data-argo.ifremer.fr/dac/aoml/4900785/profiles/D4900785_048.nc on 2020 June 24.

See also

Other raw datasets: R3901602_163.nc, SD5903586_001.nc, SR2902204_131.nc

Examples

library(argoFloats)
a <- readProfiles(system.file("extdata", "D4900785_048.nc", package="argoFloats"))
summary(a)
#> argoFloats summary
#> ------------------
#> 
#> * type:        argos
#> * contains 1 objects
#> * hint: access list of oce::argo objects with x[["argos"]] or a single one with e.g. x[[1]]
#> * Processing Log
#> 
#>     - 2022-05-26 12:00:15 UTC: `create 'argoFloats' object`
#>     - 2022-05-26 12:00:15 UTC: `readProfiles(profiles = system.file("extdata", "D4900785_048.nc",     package = "argoFloats"))`
summary(a[[1]])
#> Argo Summary
#> ------------
#> 
#> * Source:              "/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/argoFloats/extdata/D4900785_048.nc"
#> * id:                  "4900785"
